column1: 21;What is the reason for the prohibition on using water in the exhibition?;"
It is severely forbidden to: damage the walls of the stand or change their
colours: activate machines not provided with all the security requirements; make
demonstrations that could cause fire risks or other danger; remain inside the
exhibition after the closing charged. It is not permitted to use water and no
connection is available.";21;[' \nStrictly forbidden to operate equipment lacking essential safety features '
column2: ' \nForbidden activities encompass conducting fire-risk demonstrations or other hazardous maneuvers '
column3: ' \nStand rules prohibit unauthorized entry after closing time '
column4: ' \nSecurity protocols strictly enforce restrictions on machinery usage '
column5: ' \nDamaging stand walls and changing colors is severely prohibited '
column6: ' \nEquipment must be operated within parameters established for safe use '
column7: ' \nFire hazards and other dangers prompted by demonstration actions are strictly forbidden '
column8: ' \nExhibition attendees must exit the premises upon closing '
column9: ' \nUnauthorized water usage or electrical connections are strictly not permitted '
